Groups.Title: Restaurants
Groups.Subtitle: Ask not what you can do for your country. Ask what's for lunch. - Orson Welles

Items.Title: Sunny's Restaurant
Items.Description: #50, Lavelle Road, Opposite Loom, Bangalore, Karnataka 560001, Open today 12:00 - 11:00 pm
Items.Content: Sunny's Restaurant is situated in Bangalore, Karnataka. It is well-known for European/Continental Cuisine. It also serves Italian, Drinks & Snacks.
Items.Feedback: Soma: Nice place, great ambience, food quality is very good{0}Rob:Great place to hangout
Items.TextUpdate: Lunch Buffet only @ 365 including all taxes

Items.Title: Samarkand
Items.Description: Ground Floor, Gem Plaza, Infantry Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, Open today 12:00 - 3:30 pm, 7:00 - 11:00 pm
Items.Content: A rugged terrain. An earthy people. A fascinating culture. And a rich cuisine. The North West Frontier is famous for all of these. Samarkhand serves the flavours of this frontier in great style in India's Garden City. From the tastefully put together interiors to the trademark hospitality of staff dressed in spiffy sherwanis and turbans to the delightfully varied spread, Samarkhand is an experience you won't forget in a hurry. The food is inspired by the adventurous people of Mongolia, Afghanistan and Samarkand, but wonderfully adapted for the Indian palate. Samarkhand's also has a well-stocked bar that serves some exotic specialties such as angoori nasha and iran-e-gulbadan besides the regular range of cocktails, wines and liquour. The restaurant's desserts, such as bakhlava and khubani ka meetha, a traditional Afghani preparation of apricots, are a perfect way to end a great meal. So popular is the Samarkand fare and so renowned the menu that nothing has changed since its inception.
Items.Feedback: Avijit: affordable price, food quality askdj alksjd ;lsakda d;lsakd sa;ldksald ksaldk a kd;lsad{0}Saidul:enjoyed food very much, 3 of 5
Items.TextUpdate: Veg Buffet Lunch with Unlimited Drinks

Items.Title: Herbs & Spices
Items.Description: 154, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560066, Open today 12:00 - 3:00 pm, 7:00 - 11:00 pm
Items.Content: Herbs and Spices is a Veg and Non-Veg restaurant. It is most sought on weekdays and weekends. Herbs & Spice even organize birthday parties, Lunch & Dinner buffets, Conferences & outdoor caterings. The most expensive main course meal is under 250/- INR and is of lavish quantity not sacrificing the quality. Herbs & Spices was established by Chefs-Deepak Jaya & Paddy, who have formed a team of trained crew, who are committed to the beliefs of the promoters. The Owners Deepak Jaya & Paddy, ventured into the restaurant business after a combined experience of 35 years with the Taj Group of Hotels in India and Luxury Cruise Liners.
Items.Feedback: Avijit: affordable price, food quality askdj alksjd ;lsakda d;lsakd sa;ldksald ksaldk a kd;lsad{0}Saidul:enjoyed food very much, 3 of 5
Items.TextUpdate: Veg Buffet Lunch with Unlimited Drinks

Items.Title: Caperberry Restaurant
Items.Description: #203, 2nd Floor, The Collection, UB City, 24 Vittal Mallya Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, Open today 12:30 - 3:00 pm, 7:30 - 11:30 pm
Items.Content: As one enters Caperberry, located in the very office-like environs of Dickenson Road, you can't help notice the plethora of awards and recognitions that set the tone for how the 'Best Independent Restaurant' in India positions itself. Although my wariness about well recommended places finds justification here as well, when I find that the table we're promptly directed to, is rickety and the table cloth has a bit of a tear. Any how, we're guided to an alternate seating, at the mostly empty restaurant (save the expats at two of the tables) and we settle in, for the highly recommended 7 course non veg tasting menu. Here's my take on how it went thereafter:- Decor: Simplistic. Infact, slightly in need of up-gradation given the visible signs of wear and tear. Seating is comfortable. The plus side is that the place makes you feel right at home without any of the highly avoidable fine-dining pretension and stuffiness.

Items.Title: Little Italy
Items.Description: 32, Krishna Nagar Industrial Area Off Hosur Road, Bangalore Dairy Road, Koramangala Layout Bengaluru, Karnataka 560029 Open today 12:00 - 11:30 pm
Items.Content: Imagine relaxing in elegant Italy savoring a classic cuisine with a perfect wine. That's the kind of experience we wish to indulge you in when you visit Little Italy.

Items.Title: Gopalan Innovation Mall
Items.Description: Bannerghatta Main Road, Near-Mico Checkpost, Bangalore, Karnataka 560076, Open today 10:00 am - 11:00 pm
Items.Content: Gopalan Mall is one of the best malls in Bangalore. Our malls house has 2 Screens Multiplex, Fine Dining area, Hypermarket, Retail Brands show rooms, food courts, retails etc.

Items.Title: Mantri Square
Items.Description: No 1, Malleshwaram, Sampige Road, Jai Bheema Nagar, Sampangiram Nagar, Bangalore, Karnataka 560003
Items.Content: It is located in Malleswaram. It provides a good valet parking facility to the shoppers. There is countless number of products and services available here like modular kitchen, children clothing, book store, electronics & home appliance, footwear, tour operator, maternity wear & accessories, jewellery, computer hardware dealers, department store, luggage, game centre, cosmetics, cellphone showroom, party supplies, leather products, boutiques, fancy & gift shop, beauty parlour, sports shop, supermarket, sweet shop, fashion accessories and this list is endless. There is lot in the entertainment segment as well there is a multiplex which is run by Inox cinemas which is seen over crowded on the weekends and also there is a pub named Amoeba which is always spotted jam-packed. This mall is a complete family fun destination

Items.Title: Forum Mall
Items.Description: 21, Hosur Rd, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095
Items.Content: Bangalore witnesses another first from the Prestige Group - A Retail Centre that Entertains or if you so choose an Entertainment Centre that Retails. Perhaps we need to coin a word for a new experience. How about: 'Retailment' or 'Entertailing'? Located at Koramangala, a prosperous and high density catchments area and a mere 10 minutes from Brigade Road, is 4 and half acres of main road abutting land that will soon house Three and a half lakh square foot of pulsating entertainment and brand penetrating retailing all under one roof.

Items.Title: Lalbag
Items.Description: Lal Bagh Road, Lalbagh, Mavalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560004, 6:00 am - 7:00 pm
Items.Content: A botanical garden, commissioned by the Hyder Ali in 1760. The 240-acre (0.97 km2) park is home to over 1000 species of flora and a Glass House. The park is known for its annual flower show. The garden surrounds one of the towers erected by the founder of Bangalore, Kempe Gowda I. The Lal Bagh Rock, dates back to 3000 million years, is another attraction

Items.Title: Cubbon Park
Items.Description: Kasturba Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
Items.Content: Located in the heart of the city and spreads over 300 acres (1.2 km2). The park was created in 1884, by Major General Richard Sankey. The park is home to numerous trees and

Items.Title: JP Narayan Biodiversity Park (JP Park)
Items.Description: Bengaluru, Karnataka
Items.Content: Near Chowdeshwari Bus Stand | Mathikere, Bangalore, India. Musical Fountain of JP Park was awesome, marvelous, fantastic etc. etc. The location of the park is nearby to M S Ramaiah college and Yashwantpur railway station is within 5 Kms reach. You could hear train whistle quite often from inside the park. The park is having few lakes with plenty of greenaries to offer. You could find so many varieties of plants well maintained. Visitors are allowed up to a certain area to see/feel the environment. Apart from all these, park offers the best musical fountain in the city. The show lasted for 25 minutes and it was awesome. Few things should be kept in mind while visiting the park: 1. Foods were not allowed inside. 2. Musical Fountain Show timings are: 7:00 pm and 7:45 pm. 3. Ticket counter opens at 6:00 pm. 4. Entry fee to the park is free, 10 rupees per head for Musical Fountain show. 5. Around 2.5k spectators used to come for 1st show in the weekends. So, it used to be a long queue at the ticket counter. For 2nd show, queue remains a bit shorter. 6. The parking facility is available outside surrounding the park but not easy to find a space nearby the entrance.

Items.Title: Bangalore Palace
Items.Description: Near Mount Carmel Institute of Management, Palace Road, Vasanth Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560052
Items.Content: Located near Mekhri Circle and Cantonment Railway station and is built to look like a smaller replica of the Windsor Castle in England.  The Bangalore Palace was the private

Items.Title: Bangalore fort
Items.Description: New Tharagupet, Bengaluru, Karnataka
Items.Content: Originally built by Kempegowda in 1537 A D. It is located next to the Victoria Hospital Gate in the K.R Market area.

Items.Title: Mayo Hall
Items.Description: Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Sivanchetti Gardens, Bengaluru, Karnataka
Items.Content: Designed in memory of the Lord Mayo and is regarded as one of the finest designs of British architecture

Items.Title: National Gallery of Modern Art
Items.Description: 49 Palace Road, Manikyavelu Mansion, Bengaluru, 560052
Items.Content: It showcases modern Indian art and houses paintings by Raja Ravi Verma, Jamini Roy, Amrita Sher-Gil, Rabindranath Tagore and a large number of Modern and Contemporary

Items.Title: Karnataka Chitrakala Parishath
Items.Description: No.1 Art Complex, Kumara krupa Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
Items.Content: An art Gallery of high standards and is the home to traditional Mysore art, as well as European Art, mainly Russian.

Items.Title: Vidhana Soudha
Items.Description: Dr Ambedkar rd, Sampangi Ramnagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
Items.Content: The seat of the state legislature of Karnataka. It is an imposing granite building, built in 1956 in the 'Neo-Dravidian' style, incorporates elements of Indo-Saracenic, Rajasthani

Items.Title: National Military Memorial
Items.Description: Raj Bhavan Road, Bangalore, India
Items.Content: Raj Bhavan Road, Bangalore, India. This place is located right in the heart of the city. A much needed defence memorial in Bangalore. It is one rare place which brings in a sense of patriotism in Bangalore. The greenery in the park brings in a serene feeling to the mind. The most important feature of this park is it contains a series of walls bearing the names of the martyred soldiers of India who have laid down their lives in various situations right from the World War to the recent terrorist operations.

Items.Title: Indian Institute of Management Bangalore
Items.Description: Bannerghatta Road, Bilekahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560076
Items.Content: The Indian Institute of Management Bangalore is a public business school located in Bangalore, Karnataka, India. Founded in 1973, it was the third IIM to be established, after IIM Calcutta and IIM Ahmedabad.

Items.Title: Chowdiah Memorial Hall
Items.Description: Gayathri Devi Park Extension, Near-Gayathri Devi Park, Vyalikaval, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560003, 10:30 am - 2:30 pm 3:30 - 5:30 pm
Items.Content: Chowdiah Memorial Hall is a cultural centre in Bangalore which provides a home for musical and theatrical performances as well as competitions. Located in Malleswaram, it was built as a tribute to Tirumakudalu Chowdiah

Items.Title: Rangashankara
Items.Description: No.36/2, 8th Cross Road, JP Nagar 2nd Phase, JP Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560078
Items.Content: Ranga Shankara is a world-class theatre facility in Bangalore, India. The most affordable theatre space in India today, Ranga Shankara is dedicated to showcasing theatrical performances from India and abroad, to producing and commissioning new and innovative theatre forms and productions, and facilitating outreach programmes to build audiences for theatre and to impart theatre skills.

Items.Title: Rex Theatre
Items.Description: Building No.12, Brigade Road, Sampangirama Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560024, 10:00 am  10:00 pm
Items.Content: One of the most entertaining, crowded and happening movie theatre in Bangalore. Though not a multiplex movie hall, still always housefull :-)

Items.Title: M Chinnaswamy Stadium
Items.Description: Cubbon Road, Shivaji Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
Items.Content: Visited several times to see IPL as well as one Day matches. it is second big stadium after Kolkata.pavilion stands

Items.Title: Bangalore Turf Club Race Course
Items.Description: Racecourse Rd, Racecourse, Gandhi Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
Items.Content: The Bangalore Race Course is laid out in barely 85 acres. In this relatively small area, apart from the enclosures, stands and offices, there are the main grass track, three training tracks, an equine swimming pool, training schools, walking rings, 1040 stables, a veterinary hospital and an amateur riding school. This race course is probably the only one in the world where the limited space is available has been so comprehensively utilized to provide such varied facilities.

Items.Title: Bannerghatta National Park
Items.Description: Bannerghatta Road, Bannerghatta, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560083
Items.Content: Bannerghatta National Park, near Bangalore, Karnataka, southern India, was founded in 1971 and declared as a national park in 1974. In 2002 a portion of the park, became a biological reserve, the Bannerghatta Biological Park.

Items.Title: Bangalore Aquarium
Items.Description: Corporation circle, Bengaluru, Karnataka
Items.Content: Second largest aquarium in India. It is located at the entrance of Cubbon Park in Bangalore, India, and was established in 1983. It has a variety of exotic cultivable as well as

Items.Title: Art of Living Foundation
Items.Description: 21st km, Kanakarapura Road, Udaipura, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560082
Items.Content: On the Kanakapura Road which is very famous for the serene ambiance and the rejuvenating effect of the atmosphere with the people all over the world visiting it to attend

Items.Title: Pyramid Valley
Items.Description: Maitreya-Buddha Vishwalayam, Kebbedoddi Village, Near Harohalli, Kanakapura Road, Ramanagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 562112
Items.Content: Kanakapura Road, Bangalore, India. A must for those learning about meditation. the biggest pyramid shaped meditation hall in the world, along with being the largest pyramid

Groups.Title: NightClub
Groups.Description: pub, nightclub, food, drink, salsa, tango, hiphop, dance

Items.Title: Ice Bar
Items.Description: Vivanta By Taj - Mahatma Gandhi Road, Bangalore
Items.Content: Unwind. Chill out. Then watch the night heat up at Ice, the high-energy nightspot at Vivanta by Taj - M G Road. The drinks flow easy in this chic, sleek metallic lounge. Ice has originals (all given a secret twist) that are the most sought after. And the bar man is not telling what makes the martinis here out of this world

Items.Title: Hard Rock Cafe
Items.Description: 40, St. Marks Road, Bangalore, Karnataka 560001
Items.Content: One look at the interior of HRC, Classic!! Rock memorabilia punched all over the wall!  I have always wanted to go to HRC because of the mere feel-good factor, where you can watch Rockers(Amateurs, Stalwarts, Debutantes & sometimes not-so-good ones ..etc) play & sing music/song from an elevated platform. It is always a pleasure to be here, HRC also has a restaurant which serves continental food(yummy).

Items.Title: Fortis Hospital
Items.Description: No. 154/9, Opp IIM-B, Bannerghatta Road,Bilekahalli, Bangalore, Karnataka, 080 66 214444
Items.Content: Fortis Hospital, Bannerghatta, Bengaluru, is a 400 bed, JCI certified and NABH accredited multi-specialty tertiary care hospital. Backed by over 150 consultants and 800 other para-medical staff, the facility offers super-specialty tertiary care services for about 40 specialties such as Cardiology, Cardiac Surgery, Urology, Orthopedics, Neurology, and Neuro-Surgery.

Items.Title: Apollo Hospitals
Items.Description: 154/11, Bannerghatta Road, Amalodbhavi Nagar, Panduranga Nagar, Opposite IIM, Bangalore, Karnataka 560076
Items.Content: Apollo Hospitals, Banglore situated on Bannerghatta road is a world class JCI accredited, six-storied super speciality hospital which focuses on centers of excellence like Cardiac Sciences, Neuro Sciences, Orthopaedics, Cancer, Emergency Medicine and Solid Organ Transplants besides the complete range of more than 35 allied medical disciplines under the same roof.
